mapper.sql: `id`, `compensate_company` AS `compensateCompany`, `reclaimed_land_location` AS `reclaimedLandLocation`, `reclaimed_land_area` AS `reclaimedLandArea`, `land_certificate_number` AS `landCertificateNumber`, `land_purpose` AS `landPurpose`, `buildings_and_ancillary_buildings_area` AS `buildingsAndAncillaryBuildingsArea`, `evaluate_land_value` AS `evaluateLandValue`, `evaluate_aboveground_buildings_and_appurtenances_value` AS `evaluateAbovegroundBuildingsAndAppurtenancesValue`, `compensate_land_value` AS `compensateLandValue`, `compensate_aboveground_buildings_and_appurtenances_value` AS `compensateAbovegroundBuildingsAndAppurtenancesValue`, `create_time` AS `createTime`, `creator`, `update_time` AS `updateTime`, `updater`, `data_location` AS `dataLocation`
